La barra funcionando en todo momento y la comida muy muy buena‚Ä¶ üëçüèº Useful Report Michael Mathura 2024.11.05 Lo mejor en Bonaventure en eventos recomendado 100% Useful Report Iv√°n Vargas 2024.09.29 Bonaventure 19th is hands down the best spot in Weston! From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. The decor is charming, and the staff treats you like family, ensuring that every visit is a delightful experience. The menu offers a fantastic variety of dishes that are both delicious and beautifully presented. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a hearty meal or a light snack, there‚Äôs something for everyone. I highly recommend trying their signature dishes ‚Äì you won‚Äôt be disappointed! What truly sets Bonaventure 19th apart is the sense of community. It‚Äôs a place where friends and families gather, making it perfect for any occasion. The live music adds an extra touch, creating a lively yet relaxed vibe. If you‚Äôre looking for a place to eat and feel at home, Bonaventure 19th is the perfect choice. I can‚Äôt wait to return! Useful Report Miryam Miranda 2024.06.09 Useful Report Advertisement Carol Chenoweth 2024.06.09 The worst experience that I ever had in a restaurant. The food was very mediocre, poor quality and tasteless. The Manager of the restaurant was rude, offensive and very disrespectful. He's a very poor choice for any business to be successful. Useful Report Annie Olin 2024.06.08 Last Friday we had 40 women,s party, one of their appetizers crroqueta de Jamon was very salty and they burn üî• t when they fried them, it was disgusting, !!! the manager instead of coming and spologize for the inconvenience or offer something else hey wanted to charge us for these dishes were like 3 orders, dish that we returned because it was disgusting!! He came to the stage where the DJ was singing to speak in front of everybody to say he was NOT going to take those plates from the bill and it had to be paid but he was cursing and speaking very aggressive, it was really really very bad experience!! They should fire that manager!! Very unpolite!! I think a place like this deserves better management?! Hope this gets to the owners!! Useful Report Rocio Sherwood 2024.06.08 Last Friday we celebrated a birthday party at the Bonaventure 19th! We were a group of 35 ladies.My friend ordered Croketas and asked the waiter to change the dish since it was too salty and for medical reasons, she can no eat too much salt. The waiter came back from the kitchen with the same plate on his hands and stated: "Chef said ...that is the way the croketas are made" we can not take it back".!!! We were having a blast, we were dancing at the moment, when the music stopped and the Manager grabbed the microphone to interrupted the music and started yelling and using offensive words against all of us. He did not only disrespected us, but the entire people that was dining that night felt offended and expressed us their discomfort. "..I am a customer service manager for a well known retail store, Customers are the most important for me and for everyone who run a business, without customers there is not business. There is not reason to badly misbehave and miss-treated your guests the way this manager did it. It was heartbreaking to hear that someone has been verbally abused. And the only reason I am writing this review is to express my deep concern not about the food but the poor management of the restaurant. I travel all around the world just to eat, and all I am use to is just the most amazing hospitality. This Se√±or should not be dealing with people at all. The staff were very friendly and attentive. The chef made us delicious thin-sliced eggplant chips, lightly breaded and fried crispy, drilled with honey. My ground chicken sandwich with caramelized onions was mouth watering. My girls enjoyed the French fries, sweet potato fries and chicken tenders, which all had just the right amount of crispness. Next visit I can‚Äôt wait to try the paella, which smelled amazing, and that fresh ceviche. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Chef Jose Baiocchi. We appreciate your support and hope to see you again soon at Bonaventure 19th. Roman Novoa 2024.01.30 Just Deliciously. I recently had the pleasure of dining at Bonaventure 19th and enjoyed the cozy ambiance. I was greeted by an attentive and friendly staff member who guided and served me well. Jos√© A. was my waitress. I had lentil soup, and I had fish. I can't remember the name of the fish entree, but it was delicious. The price-value ratio was great, and I will certainly come back. Bonaventure 19th is a hidden gem that has earned its place in my heart as a must-visit destination for any food lover. FYI, they offer a Happy hour with an amazing 2x1 drink. I will have my Old Parr there pretty soon, for sure. Useful (1) Report Reply from casaespanatapasyvinosweston.com 2024.01.31 Thank you for your positive review of Bonaventure 19th, Roman! It's great to know that you found our fish entree delicious and enjoyed the price-value ratio. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to serving you again soon. Don't forget to check out our Happy Hour for some amazing 2x1 drinks. See you soon!
